  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

    (freestar.config.enabled_slots.length === 0) ? freestar.initCallbackCalled = false : freestar.newAdSlots(freestar.config.enabled_slots);

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="49144" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="49144" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.27</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="6405">6,405</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="805"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Wanted by Night</b> by <b>Azzaro</b> is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. <b>Wanted by Night</b> was launched in 2018. Wanted by Night was created by Quentin Bisch and Michel Girard. Top notes are Cinnamon, Mandarin Orange, Lavender and Lemon; middle notes are Fruity Notes, Incense, Cumin and Red Cedar; base notes are Tobacco, Vanilla, Cedar, Leather, Benzoin, Iso E Super, Cypress and Patchouli. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Azzaro launches Wanted by Night in the spring of 2018 as a sensual, evening edition of the original Wanted created by Fabrice Pellegrin in 2016. The new perfume is inspired by the hedonistic lifestyle of Loris Azzaro during the 1970s.</p>

<p>"Azzaro Wanted by Night is the fragrance of a modern-day seducer. An extraordinary man. Elegant, bold, mysterious, he is surrounded by an air of confidence and power. Whether night or day, he attracts and arouses desire For him, its an endless night; and for them, its a one-on-one moment that they will never forget..."</p>

<p>Azzaro Wanted by Night is announced as an explosive woody and spicy oriental of unabashed sensuality, a "blend of temptation and masculinity." The composition mixes exotic woods and spices, and highlights the three main accords: cinnamon, red cedar and tobacco.</p>

<p>The face of the advertising campaign is model Nikola Danielsen. The cylindrical Azzaro Wanted bottle is transformed with chrome-plated cap with an elegant dark smoky lacquer, to contrast the amber fragrance within.</p>

<p>The fragrance is available as a 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                              <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">173</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Very strong cinnamon note that may cause headaches
                </div>

        </a>
        <p>by <i>Elena Vosnaki, Yi Shang ( ), talo Pereira, Julia Lukyanenko, Nicola Thomis, John Biebel</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            10/29/24 09:43

    <span class="badge">28</span>
</div>
<div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/14950/news.14950-120x120.jpg" alt="Azzaro The Most Wanted Eau de Parfum Intense" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/Azzaro-The-Most-Wanted-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-14950.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Azzaro The Most Wanted Eau de Parfum Intense</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Sandra Raievi Petrovi</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            04/23/21 13:07
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">8</span>
</div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367011" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AmirMerobe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044874"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AmirMerobe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367011ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367011" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044874">AmirMerobe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This's unique and very good smelling, I've The Most Wanted EDP Intense and this one (Wanted By Night) both are my favorite from all fragrances that I've.<br />
Believe me this scent is sexy, actually both this one and TMW EDP, However both are different. Wanted By Night it's fresh, spice and fruity, while TMW EDP is sweet, amber and spice (toffee like so yummy and sexy). I usually using both in all year around, it doesn't matter if it winter or summer time. Like I said Wanted By Night it has freshness and TMW EDP it's sweet but light and not overwhelming at all, it has kind of brightness as well.<br />
<br />
Overall: 8.7/10 (if the performance is better this would be 10/10). I don't know, Why many hate this?!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2367011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2367011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2336252">ignaciosparrow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-27">11/27/24 15:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A great fragrance, it can be a little bit overwhelming so be conservative when spraying. As other reviewers have said, it is a little bit of everything, something with fruits, spices, wood, tobacco, leather... Skip it during the day and during hot days. But at night and on colder weather... my girlfriend can't get enough of it, and frankly, neither can I.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2363384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2363384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358835" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Didnt get to really fully experience it and wear it till fall started, but I have to say I really love this fragrance gives me such a confidence boost. Its a little bit of everything fruity slightly woody, cinnamon bomb fresh masculine and the performance is absolutely incredible. I own multiple niche fragrances, and I consider this one to be more niche than the fragrances I own, I love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2358835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2358835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339855" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceAnon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1596915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceAnon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted by Night"title="Wanted by Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339855ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339855" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915">FragranceAnon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 09:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first smelled this from a decant many months ago. I wasn't into it. I detected, almost exclusively, the "fruity notes" to the point that it smelled like a Jolly Rancher.<br />
<br />
Fast-forward to now. I bought it because I have been trying to appreciate sweeter fragrances (used to avoid them) and had heard this was discontinued, so I thought I'd give it another chance... I'm glad I did.<br />
<br />
Not sure if that decant was off or my nose just wasn't sensitized to it enough to appreciate it, but WBN is a great fragrance. I still get the fruity vibe, but now, the spices and incense are present. Perfect for cooler weather, and the longevity is great.<br />
<br />
I can see why this is hyped. Looking forward to wearing it more in the coming months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2339855"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2339855#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The fragrance I chose was Azzaro Wanted, and it exceeded my expectations in every way. This scent is known for its captivating blend of citrusy notes with hints of spicy ginger, woody vetiver, and tonka bean undertones. Its bold, long-lasting, and perfect for those who enjoy a vibrant and charismatic aroma.<br />
<br />
If you're looking for exceptional fragrances, I highly recommend checking out BlueAtr's collection. Their attention to quality and customer service is unparalleled.<br />

www.BlueAtr.ir</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2337554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2337554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332944" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like a sweet baked cinnamon strudel filled with oranges, apples, and topped with vanilla syrup. As it dries down you get some wood too, but mostly stays the same throughout in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2329532"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2329532#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329076" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319909" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="billblm93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377508"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1377508.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="billblm93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377508">billblm93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-18">10/18/24 11:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really nice !<br />
Opening : Mango &amp; minty bubblegum<br />
Mid &amp; drydown : fruit cocktail (oranges apples melon..) - spices - vanilla &amp; some greenness (maybe tobacco + cedar &amp; patchouli ?)<br />
Good longevity / moderate to good projection<br />
All year rounder no pb<br />
don't let the opening fool you it's not a teenager's fragrance matter of fact it's the manliest of the whole wanted list<br />
it's fresh and warm at the same time</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2319909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2319909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's not a spicy cinnamon.  This is a sweet cinnamon.  That's the prominent note for a long time.  Yes you get some woodsy notes and vanilla in time.  But I haven't made up my mind.  It may be too sweet for me.  I was hoping for a spicy cinnamon like a modern version of Obsession for Men.  Great quality just not sure it is for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2318042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2318042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Fuck you L'Oreal - you literally destroy every brand you put your hands on. Fuck you 100.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2312052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2312052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308865" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308865" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="berrymilktea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1854317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1854317.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="berrymilktea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308865ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308865" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1854317">berrymilktea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 08:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm a girl and I want this. It's so mf addicting. <br />
I do get a random banana note though anyone else?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2308865"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2308865#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308270" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alexlara"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2279736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="alexlara" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2279736">alexlara</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 17:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it breaks my heart to say that 'wanted by night' was discontinued sometime between late 2023 and early 2024. this scent is honestly addictive to smell. to my nose i dont really pick up any orange, its's more cinnamon heavy with an almost boozy quality to it. its so seductive, and if you can find a bottle for a good price, i would definitely recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2308270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2308270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303729" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303729" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Black Russian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/983477"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.983477.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Black Russian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/V-Canto/Alibi-30645.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30645.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alibi"title="Alibi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303729ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303729" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/983477">Black Russian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 12:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a case when more notes translates not into complex and well rounded but rather to cofusing. It smells like it doesn't know what it is and where it wants to go, and when it goes, it turns out to be a disappointing direction.<br />
Longevity and projection, as for fall/winter type of scent, are very disappointing too. Heck, even some good citrusy Summer freshies outperforms it. It feels like some notes just cancelling others.<br />
And no, it isn't a case of me going nose blind. I have a coworker with super sensitive nose who always bitches about me smelling like a "whole Sephora store". About hour into my workday I run into him, wondering if he will be complaining about my fragrance again. Instead he smiles and says "Ha! Someone was running late and forgot to douse himself in his stinky perfumes?.." It was little over 2 hours after I had 6 sprays of Wanted By Night, and he was standing right next to me.<br />
My batch isn't new reformulation either, it is from 2020. Wonder is they packed Covid loss of smell in it as one of ingredients?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2303729"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2303729#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303613" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303613" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rumpels"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379637"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rumpels" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Davidoff/Cool-Water-507.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.507.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cool Water"title="Cool Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303613ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303613" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379637">rumpels</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>nothing to shout about ..not required if you have spicebomb extreme ..should have saved my money towards a different fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2303613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2303613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302968" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302968" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ninkempoopigga"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162429"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2162429.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="ninkempoopigga" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-Parfum-73664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted Parfum"title="The Most Wanted Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302968ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302968" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162429">ninkempoopigga</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>****REFORMULATED****<br />
I've confirmed this is reformulated, contact me if you dont believe me.<br />
<br />
New bottle as of 26th/7/24<br />
<br />
Scent has changed side by side with bottle from 2021,<br />
<br />
Less performance: <br />
old - 8+ hours 2+ hours projection<br />
new - 4 hours maximum, 30 minutes projection. Tested multiple times and rounded from average.<br />
<br />
Refer to reddit</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2302968"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2302968#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295012" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295012" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pejatibia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1707864"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1707864.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="pejatibia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Van-Cleef-Arpels/Midnight-in-Paris-9685.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9685.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight in Paris"title="Midnight in Paris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295012ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295012" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1707864">pejatibia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 15:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The fragrance hits with an abrasive, almost scratchy note, but it softens quickly, smoothing out. It is much fruitier than most reviews suggest, with prominent notes of orange and mango. The dry, spicy cinnamon is very intense, though, and to me, it stands out as the best part of the fragrance. Picture the scent of dried holiday oranges or perhaps a spiced fruit punch  quite cozy.<br />
<br />
After the initial energetic burst, the drydown begins to mellow  it is a typical woody-vanilla blend with a slight bubblegum sweetness. Iso E Super adds a clean, synthetic touch. There's no complexity here  perhaps I've grown too accustomed to unusual Middle Eastern stinkers. It's simply a safe, pleasant scent.<br />
<br />
The longevity is average, with strong projection at the start, beginning with a bang that fades over time but lingers as a sweet skin scent. It seems more suited to a younger crowd, and it should be considered a masculine fragrance.<br />
<br />
The bottle design is attractive, reminiscent of a large American revolver's cylinder from cowboy movies.<br />
<br />
Yesterday, I reviewed Cline Intense Gold, which is very similar to this fragrance, despite costing significantly less. Of course, Cline is weaker and of slightly lower quality, but it's the same kind of basic fragrance you'd find in any drugstore, catering to less demanding tastes.<br />
<br />
Overall, this fragrance is a bit overhyped. If you're considering buying it, I recommend doing so only during sales, which happen regularly. It didn't evoke any strong emotions for me, even though I've had it for about five years. I've barely used it, even before my collection grew significantly.<br />
<br />
Opening note: 8<br />
Sillage/Projection: 7<br />
Dry down: 6<br />
Longevity: 6<br />
Blend/Composition: 7-<br />
Versatility: 7<br />
Uniqueness: 4<br />
Value for money: 4-<br />
Bottle design/Aesthetics: 9-<br />
Overall experience: 6-<br />
Blind-buy rating: 8-</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2295012"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2295012#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294690" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jambu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1474763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jambu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294690ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294690" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763">jambu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 09:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first got it I hated it and thought it kinda smells like rotten eggs. But after giving it a second chance and actually wearing it for a day and letting it dry down I thought it was alright. Nothing special though, I think there are other fragrances that are better in its price range</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2294690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2294690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290623" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="s&uuml;dnim"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448308"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1448308.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="s&uuml;dnim" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290623ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290623" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448308">s&uuml;dnim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 13:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have bottle with 99% juice up for trade or sale. Let me know if interested and have a great day</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2290623"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2290623#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2287130" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bingo30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1851398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bingo30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2287130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2287130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851398">Bingo30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-18">09/18/24 11:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The ambroxan and iso e super are cranked up to eleven in this. The synthetic scratchy elements singe my nose hairs. <br />
<br />
I do like the sort of christmas mandarin fruit vibe it goes for. It isnt a sticky honeyed fruit pie, but more the dried holiday oranges, cranberries, and spices in a seasonal potpourri.<br />
<br />
Still, cant make up for the fact the synthetic elements are too overbearing. Gives it a harsh and sorta cheap feeling.<br />
<br />
6.1/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2287130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2287130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284213" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nopz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1991069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1991069.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nopz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-Parfum-73664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted Parfum"title="The Most Wanted Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284213ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284213" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1991069">nopz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 21:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have the Wanted by Night EDP with the silver cap, from the March 2024 batch. Smells like mango bubble tea to me. Great for fall, winter, clubbing, or nights out. It would be too cloyingly sweet for hot weather. I find it pretty average and more suited to a younger crowd. For something better and more versatile, go for TMW Parfum instead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2284213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2284213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273788" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marshzcents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1768322"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1768322.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marshzcents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Blue-60332.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60332.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coach Blue"title="Coach Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1768322">Marshzcents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 11:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I managed to get a tester that is around the 2019-2021 batches I presume, since the bottle has some rust on the metal parts, the juice remains untouched. This fragrance is absolutely stunning, I immediately got reminded of Spice bomb, what you get with this is a sweet, warm, leathery, and tobacco amber fragrance. The opening is bubblegummy sweet, with some type of minty accord that stays throughout all of the mid, which is where this fragrance shines. The mid is this absolutely beautiful blend of amber, spices and tobacco, the leather on this is suedey and smooth, nothing crazy, but all around this is so well blended for such a cheap fragrance. Women love this btw, this is not going to get you crazy compliments but it will get you people trying to get closer since it is such an alluring scent. <br />
In terms of performance, I disagree with the others, this performs like crazy on me. I get 8-10hrs with strong projection for like 2-3hrs, and it never really dies down to skin scent until the very end of the fragrance. I am unaware if this has been reformulated or discontinued.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2273788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2273788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257175" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentofSatire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentofSatire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-Eau-de-Parfum-75182.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75182.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hero Eau de Parfum"title="Hero Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149868">ScentofSatire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 06:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Compliments: Very noticeable fragrance that gathers a lot of compliments! No joke, every time I have put this fragrance on someone around me has always brought it up or gave a compliment. <br />
<br />
Uniqueness: Looking at the Wanted line this is defiantly one that sounds out with the almost earthy undertones. Quite different and a DNA I haven't smelt in many other fragrances.<br />
<br />
Bottle design: Very good looking bottle that will catch your eye, Azzaro went for that "Bad boy" vibe with this bottle and have pulled it off perfectly.<br />
<br />
Overall: 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2257175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2257175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256948" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256948" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumer5501833fan3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumer5501833fan3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256948ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256948" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198755">perfumer5501833fan3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 00:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So this cologne is one of the very cinnamon perfumes I enjoy. Great longevity and projection. However I dislike the very "soft" scent; not strong at all. I had to put my nose up against the tester just to smell it. If you're going to wear this, put a lot of sprays if you want a strong scent. Very light and soft scene. And bad atomizer, makes a mess on application. But not a terrible cologne. <br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2256948"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2256948#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162429">ninkempoopigga</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Doesn't last long at all or project at all, 6 sprays and asking everyone at my workplace no one could smell it. bought it at a discounted price from chemist warehouse since it must be on clearance. Overhyped and doesnt last long. Smells ok.<br />
<br />
Spray once on my wrist and its gone after an hour. New bottle is ugly and I'm guessing it's reformulated maybe due to this, it just doesn't smell like what everyone in the reviews are saying, and is anything but beastly in terms of projection sillage and longevity. CDN fragrances last longer and smell better for half the price... disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2255589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2255589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216643">Tyann</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 14:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought it and honestly its the worst lol. Its not that it smells bad but it performs so poorly on my skin, a couple hours and its gone. But I am really unhappy with this purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2254461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2254461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252799" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LuisPedro9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2187448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LuisPedro9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2187448">LuisPedro9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just got this today, blind buy. The opening is nothing special, typical spicy frag.<br />
<br />
The drydown is beatiful though. It's the perfect mix of sweet and spicy with a hint of mandarin orange and vanilla.<br />
<br />
Perfect for a date night in the summer, or at any time in winter/fall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2252799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2252799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241202" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241202" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Albesure80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214808"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2214808.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Albesure80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241202ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241202" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214808">Albesure80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 19:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just picked up this fragrance not too long ago. It was a blind buy. I base most of my purchases on the review videos I watch. I'm glad I did for this one! I have 1 million by Rabban edt and that's the only frag in my collection remotely close to the way this one smells like. It's quite unique. I live in South Texas so in the summer it's kind of hard to wear. It's only wearable at night in the comforts of your home with the A/C blowing. Definitely would recommend it for the colder months. So, for me that's like 5 months out of the year? But other than that, I would strongly recommend this beast performer. It's a must have!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2241202"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2241202#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240472" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230022" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="euvs71"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249843"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249843.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="euvs71" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alfred-Dunhill/Icon-29229.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29229.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Icon"title="Icon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249843">euvs71</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 09:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It seems like this has been bought back. It is available online and in the stores in my country. But is it the same as it was? I tried it in a shopping mall today, and it seemed a bit fresher and fruitier than I remember it, but also more synthetic and not as deep as it used to be. It resembles more the original wanted. Can somebody confirm if it has been resurected and reformulated? The tester bottle was almost full, so maybe it just hasnt matured yet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2230022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2230022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218952" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218952" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent master 1998"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194928"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent master 1998" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218952ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218952" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194928">Scent master 1998</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For Indian audience let me make it simple, this one smells like artificial mango juice such as frooti/maza or mango bite infused in cinnamon (bubble gummy mango drink with cinnamon). Nothing special, performance is either too low or I'm nose blind, not sure</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2218952"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2218952#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
