blind buy worthy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2218097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2218097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211394" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jadenfragrancess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2178993"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jadenfragrancess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211394ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211394" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2178993">Jadenfragrancess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 20:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first spray I get sweetness with some spice and cinnamon, but I mostly detect that Orange mandarin note. Dry down it smells like vanilla and pancake syrup. Performance seems good, I get a bit over 8 hours on my skin, radiates good off my skin that whole time as I can always sniff the spot I sprayed and am able to smell it. Out of the 50ish fragrances I have put on my skin, I havent experienced another one that changes this much from opening to dry down. Overall this smells great and has good performance, I think this has the PERFECT vibe and smell for fall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2211394"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2211394#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203133" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tahsinss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812807"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tahsinss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Arabians-Tonka-57384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Arabians Tonka"title="Arabians Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203133ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203133" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812807">Tahsinss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 12:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely fragrance! This can be worn in all seasons, even in cooler summer days/summer nights. The opening is amazing, there's a lot of sweet cinnamon-y citrus, while the dry down is much darker. The dry down is where the tobacco and the spices shine. Overall a very very good all rounder to have in your collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2203133"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2203133#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197765" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; All my brain could focus on was the cumin note, which made it smell like bad BO that somebody was trying to cover up with cologne<br />
<br />
Let it sit for a little over a year<br />
<br />
Still ****ing hate the deep drydown lmao, for the same reason<br />
<br />
But the opening now out of nowhere is absolutely brilliant, like magical brilliant. I wish I would stay like that forever, and if I spray it on clothes I get a little bit more time w/ it like that. But unfortunately it always eventually dries down to this dusty, musty BO smell that really kills it for me<br />
<br />

It fools you with a strong quality gorgeous opening but drys down to a weak performing cheap quality lame disappointment</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2189565"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2189565#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180479" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180479" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bababrr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1695936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1695936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bababrr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180479ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180479" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1695936">Bababrr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 17:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fruity, spicy, sweet, vanilla, tobacco and hint of incense notes that are all blended together very well. Slight bubblegum feel to it but not as forward as Invictus type of way. Smells really really good. Pretty additive to smell my hand constantly when I wear it, which isnt much as I try to spare it nowadays. Logenvity is about 7-8 hours with moderate projection for first couple of hours. <br />
<br />
With under a few mls left of my bottle, and over 2 years with this fragrance I can say I enjoyed it. Definitely worth a bottle if you can still find it for a relatively good price now that its discontinued.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2180479"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2180479#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173018" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2173018" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sum Dood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2151173"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sum Dood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2173018ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2173018" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2151173">Sum Dood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-30">05/30/24 21:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wonderful blend of notes in this fragrance. I love the cinnamon and citrus combination. It is a pretty strong fragrance so you only need maybe 5 sprays. Lasts long as well and has a decent price tag. Snag it up from a discounter!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2173018"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2173018#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2166965" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BandmanMrBandman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BandmanMrBandman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-56358.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56358.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2166965ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2166965" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102">BandmanMrBandman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-24">05/24/24 17:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wanted By Night is a truly lives up to name being a more intimate and warmer version of Wanted EDT. They are very similar to each other with the original being more fresh spicy and By Night is warm spicy with a sweet nuance. The cinnamon is present from the beginning and lasts throughout most of the 6-8 hours and gives that warmth to it, which would make a great date night fragrance as it stays close to your skin after that first hour for so. Personally prefer this over the EDT as the warm dry down is nice when you can smell it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2166965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2166965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163304" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265999">Invasionbg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 15:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just worn this today and I realised how much oak moss is in there. I have a real oak moss absolute at home and I'm very familiar with the smell. Here is plenty of it in the dry down. Very bold decision from Azzaro. Very interesting fragrance with many facets. The fruit notes however come across a bit too sweet and in your face. This is something that I personally don't like. The rest is very well done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2160395"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2160395#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148208" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133344" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Milestone87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Milestone87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861">Milestone87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 23:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just spray this Fragrance on, its a very special great Fragrance smells just like the EDT Wanted. SAME DNA, but with more sugary fruity notes added to it. I really enjoy it. But people around me dont really like it. maybe i spray to much on it. So be careful dontr overspray it. But i have to say i really like the sugary sweetness mix with some great masculiness into it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2133344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2133344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can't believe how flat it smells on the strip compared to on my skin! padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113613" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luk3tait"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043011"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="luk3tait" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113613ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113613" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043011">luk3tait</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 21:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>initially i gave this an "ok" - but i hadn't worn it for a while, so i let it sit (didn't macerate just left it) and i've definitely come around on it. i still stand by most of what i said, this is incredibly strong, and very spicy but after coming back i can pick up that orange note a lot more, it's a lot sweeter than i thought (though still very spicy/strong) which i like, i'm a fan of sweeter/tropical/fresh fragrances so obviously this isn't my type of thing but i definitely do like this now. not great, and it's definitely for special occasions (could see this as a date night/bar type of fragrance) and it's definitely not for everyday use (was wearing this to school before. ) but i'm a lot more sold on this than i was before</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2113613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2113613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101272" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2101272" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GioiaVerratti"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1683528"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1683528.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GioiaVerratti" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/The-Dark-Side-40884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Dark Side"title="The Dark Side"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2101272ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2101272" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1683528">GioiaVerratti</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 21:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azzaro Wanted by Night is like a chaotic symphony of scents that surprisingly harmonize. Before even peeking at its olfactory pyramid, I caught whiffs of a fruity-spicy blend with hints of incense, leather, and more. It sounds like a jumble, but trust me, it works.<br />
<br />
It kicks off with a sweet, spicy punch led by cinnamon, then swiftly transitions into a fruity cocktail with warm woodiness tagging along. As it settles, the woodiness takes center stage, with tobacco, vanilla, and patchouli playing supporting roles in the background. It's like a journey from the lively streets to the cozy depths of a wood-paneled lounge. Despite its seemingly random mix of notes, Azzaro Wanted by Night manages to pull off an intriguing and inviting scent that's perfect for a night out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2101272"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2101272#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093951" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2093951" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clarry Rewi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1826317.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clarry Rewi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2093951ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2093951" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826317">Clarry Rewi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-15">03/15/24 20:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"This one is definitely suitable for someone whos mature, adventurous, and confident. The scent is truly unique. While many might immediately detect cinnamon in the opening, I'd have to disagree. To me, the opening resembles a boozy, sweet, and spicy butterscotch with a hint of sweet dates. The dry down is extraordinary, transitioning into a more woody, sweet, and spicy fragrance with subtle fruity notes. It's a superbly executed cologne, and I love it."</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2093951"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2093951#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093717" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2093717" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jetik356"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1690986"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jetik356" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Intense-2011-13016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Intense 2011"title="Dior Homme Intense 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2093717ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2093717" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1690986">Jetik356</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-15">03/15/24 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Been wearing this for about a year now and am very disappointed to see it getting discontinued. The opening isa blast of cinnamon and synthetic fruits, but dries down to a sweet fruity, woody spice. During the late dry down the fruits and spice disappear, leaving a musky incense scent. This late dry down reminds me heavily of the incense dry down of Dylan blue(without the ambroxane.<br />
Easily my best performing fragrances, one spray on neck will last me all day no problem. also girlfriends loves it which is a bonus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
side note, as its heavily rated as masculine (and i dont disagree): not a man, felt very comfortable wearing it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2093307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2093307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Rolf Night Vision EDP which I love &amp; own. <br />
Love'em both.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2086318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2086318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2003243">Gulag Gary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 18:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Incredible opening of dark fruit, cinnamon, honey and a little citrus. There's a mysterious allure to this one that will make you stand out on a night out. Reminds me of a pot of compote boiling on the stove with spices added to it. The window in the house is open and you can smell someone chopping fresh cut cedar. Definite stunner. Disappointed that it's being discontinued, so I bought a backup bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2082406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2082406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can see how its not for everyone but i'd say its a safe blind buy, my second best in my collection.<br />
<br />
value for money 5/5<br />
opening 3.5/5<br />
dry down 4/5<br />
performance 5/5<br />
overall 4/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2080093"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2080093#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074206" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2073810" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AidenT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032566"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2032566.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AidenT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Leather-63355.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63355.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Leather"title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2073810ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2073810" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032566">AidenT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-25">02/25/24 12:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very solid fragrance but the cumin note in it is overpowering in my opinion so it kinda ruined it for me. Very masculine fragrance. I see people saying its youthfull and I completely dissagree. I think its the most mature one out of the wanted line. If you like cinammon and cumin and you are a man over 20. Then its something for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2073810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2073810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2071785" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chipchippahson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791709"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chipchippahson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2071785ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2071785" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791709">chipchippahson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 13:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It took months to come to terms with this. Honestly, I still hate the opening, it smells like a cheap cinnamony Yankee Candle ripoff. But the further into the drydown it goes, the more enjoyable it gets. It's complex without being dense or heavy, and eventually becomes aromatic in a way that cuts through cold weather effectively. A nice alternative to typical heavier fall/winter scents. Even the overly synthetic fruity and stale tobacco notes (on my skin at least) actually end up being welcome components, although it takes a few hours to get there.<br />
<br />
This was a blind buy, and I did pick it up during the "it's going to be discontinued" panic that was happening late last year (bought into the hype, I guess). The price hasn't seemed to have dropped at all through discounters at the time of this review, and it's still readily available.<br />
<br />
This wouldn't be a repurchase at current 100 ml prices, but it's unlikely the bottle will run out anytime soon as it doesn't get used in the rotation too much tbh. It's unique, and it's nice, but it's waaaay too synthetic smelling for the first couple hours. Normally I don't care about that kind of stuff, but it's so harsh in the beginning I actively dislike it until the notes settle. Longetivity is like 6-ish hours with moderate projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2071785"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2071785#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071102" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2071102" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="arnoe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029200"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="arnoe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2071102ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2071102" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029200">arnoe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 00:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>rlly love this, them discontinuing it makes me wanna kms</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2071102"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2071102#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070427" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2070427" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sandy_S"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1776523"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1776523.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sandy_S" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2070427ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2070427" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1776523">Sandy_S</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-22">02/22/24 08:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't go by any reviews you read here. The main factor that everyone forgets to mention here is which region of the world they are using the perfume in. Some perfumes perform good in hot regions while some perform good in colder regions and vice versa. I stay in Singapore and its a moderately hot climate here. And here this perfume just bursts with fragrance. 3-4 sprays get me along all day.<br />
Just go to a store and test it first, If you like it then only buy it.<br />
<br />
Okay coming back to Azzaro Wanted By Night.... This perfume is just AWESOME.!! <br />
It smells so good and different from anything else Ive tried. Its like a mix of spicy, fruity, and woody notes that make me feel amazing. Its not too strong or too weak, its just right.<br />
I wear it mostly at night, when I go out with my family or friends, and sometimes on certain occasions, also wear it at my workplace. It's a compliment beast and will always get you noticed, because its not a common or boring scent. Its a scent that makes you stand out.<br />
If youre looking for a perfume that will make you feel bold, mysterious, and seductive, then you should definitely try Wanted by Night. Trust me, you wont regret it </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2070427"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2070427#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068679" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AverageManSmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2021625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2021625.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AverageManSmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2021625">AverageManSmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-20">02/20/24 16:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts off very fruity, warm, and spicy. It becomes woodier and ambery on the dry down. Projection stays consistent for about 4-6 hours although it's not as loud as I expected. My only issue is that the ambery dry down starts to feel very synthetic as time goes by. Not a bad fragrance. Fun to wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2068679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2068679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066911" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2063982"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2063982#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062236" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bdgarver"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1834547"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bdgarver" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-2021-84716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo 2021"title="Valentino Uomo 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062236ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062236" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1834547">bdgarver</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 13:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you are over 35 all of these Wanted flankers are too sweet &amp; fruity.  I WANTED to like them so I tried all flankers but all are same jumbled sweet mess of combined fruity notes.  Great bottle design though!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2062236"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2062236#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061970" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Miracle.Fragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369006.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Miracle.Fragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061970ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061970" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369006">Miracle.Fragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 08:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the smell of tobacco with the addition of sweet fruit.<br />
The downside is that this perfume is quite close to the skin, but the longevity is very good. and in my opinion this is the best version of the Azzaro Wanted series.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2061970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2061970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2060458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060458" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dfreeman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dfreeman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Extreme-30499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Extreme"title="Spicebomb Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820254">dfreeman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-12">02/12/24 18:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cinnamon in this is very apparent, surrounded by fruits and woods. Feels very youthful yet masculine. I would never dare wear this in warmer weather lol. There's definitely a lot going on, which is probably why this gave me a headache after wearing it for a while. I really did enjoy the scent, but I had to sell it for the reason that I felt sick whenever I wore it.<br />
<br />
7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2060458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2060458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056435" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480042">fallz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 14:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Why in the world did I sell my bottle I must have been tweakin. I recently smelled this on a coworker and immediately knew it was Wanted by Night. I'm not sure why people say it's weak because when my coworker walked into the breakroom it filled up the room and was all I could smell. It reminded me how unique this designer cologne was and I knew I should pick it up before it gets impossible to find.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2056435"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2056435#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1562914">Ricketycricket</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 18:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best synthetic messes out there. Smells like Mexican tamarind candy to me. Gonna try to hunt down another bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2053365"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2053365#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052721" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mango0951"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901369"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1901369.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mango0951" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901369">Mango0951</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rating:  (4/5)<br />
<br />
Azzaro's Wanted by Night is a confident and daring fragrance that leaves a lasting impression. The initial burst of cinnamon and mandarin orange creates an attention-grabbing opening, perfect for nighttime or formal occasions. The heart notes introduce a rich blend of cedar and cumin, adding depth and intensity. The base notes of tobacco and vanilla deliver a warm and seductive dry down.<br />
<br />
Wanted by Night boasts commendable longevity, lingering throughout the evening with a strong sillage that makes a confident statement without being overpowering. The revolver-shaped bottle, with its dark gradient and gunmetal finish, mirrors the fragrance's bold personality.<br />
<br />
In conclusion, Azzaro's Wanted by Night is a versatile and memorable choice for those who appreciate a bold and sophisticated scent. It successfully captures the essence of the night, making a powerful statement that lingers in the memory.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2052721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2052721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050341" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gustaph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1605341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1605341.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gustaph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1605341">Gustaph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-02">02/02/24 15:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been using this fragrance moderately during the past 3 months. This fragrance is fruity and sweet with undertones of vanilla and cinnamon. It's a great-smelling fragrance for colder months but it's in my opinion too fruity. I would like a bit stronger smell of vanilla. I would not buy this again but from what I've heard I like it less than my friends do. I give this fragrance a 3,6/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2050341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2050341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A great powdery and sweet fragrance where the mandarin adds a touch of freshness in the opening. Great longevity and good projection I give it an 8.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2046679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2046679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2041112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I got wanted by night. The og wanted is better and so are all the flankers except wanted edp and wanted tonic. It just smells basic and nothing crazy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2041112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2041112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2040767" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Qpa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1987086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Qpa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2040767ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2040767" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987086">Qpa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-24">01/24/24 13:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You know you're the one who wants everything and a little extra out of the ordinary. You who are seen. You who explode in social contexts with exuberant energy. So is this scent. It is very extra of everything. It can catch you in a flood of compliments. Demands a lot from its wearer. You can't be mean with an H&amp;M suit. You have unique brands, likewise your fragrance. This one rocks your world. You who are a little extra and far from normal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2040767"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2040767#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2040406" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Felixthreeone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Felixthreeone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Uden-Overdose-52433.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52433.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uden Overdose"title="Uden Overdose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2040406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2040406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753657">Felixthreeone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-24">01/24/24 06:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is an absolute damn mess. An over-the-top, unapologetic mess. A complete and utter mishmash of notes that make almost no sense when viewed from a screen or on paper. An explosion of fruits, cinnamon, woods, and some other stuff that shouldn't be considered appropriate by the human race.<br />
 <br />
....But this stuff is insanely awesome. It is addictive, in a way that is almost indescribable. I really love this, but I'm not sure why. For all intents and purposes, I shouldn't. Something which lacks identity, yet is unique and there's no reason for it. It walks along with the wanted DNA somehow, but diverges at the same time. I'm baffled. I like the other offerings, as I don't consider myself a 'snob' from a fragrance perspective (I pretty much can appreciate almost everything unless it is really off-putting). Reading some of the comments, they make sense. On many points. But, for whatever reason, this has become my favorite from this line. It makes no sense, I know. Unless you know this fragrance, and have found yourself returning to it with an odd fascination that keeps you wearing it over and over.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2040406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2040406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036888" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Someone made a comment about the room smelling like curry and knowing full well no food had been consumed in that room I realised it was the fragrance I was wearing. Safe to say projection/sillage wasn't a problem although luckily for me the longevity was short lived and everything had become a skin scent by hour 4.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
