I bought the OG and gave it to my grandson right away. He said he wears it once in a whilenot his favorite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2021415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2021415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017747" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ethan-fragrantica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673973"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ethan-fragrantica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017747ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017747" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673973">ethan-fragrantica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 07:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wanted by Night by Azzaro: <br />
This is a very sweet, warm spicy fragrance that makes me think of spiced fruit at Christmas. I love the warm cosy feeling it provides and its got incredible performance and longevity. Suitable for any age really, but I could see it more on an older guy. Could be used as a clubbing fragrance or even just on a chill autumn/winter day or night. Woody, slightly citrusy and incredibly unique-this is one of my all time favourite winter frags and its a real shame about the discontinuation rumours, if anyone knows of any clones/similar frags please let me know (the other Wanted line don't have the same vibe as this one unfortunately).<br />
<br />
Top notes: Cinnamon, spiced orange, a touch of lavender and maybe lemon.<br />
Middle notes: Cedar, incense, warm fruit and cumin.<br />
Base notes: Stronger cedar, patchouli and tobacco.<br />
<br />
Longevity: 4.5/5<br />
Sillage: 4/5<br />
Scent: 5/5<br />
Design: 5/5<br />
Gender: Masculine<br />
Overall: 5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2017747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2017747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010322" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yung Tzle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874781.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yung Tzle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010322ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010322" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874781">Yung Tzle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-25">12/25/23 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im just your average every day user, 15 years old male, and the opening of this frag is a bit harsh with all the spices. The open kinda tickles my nose I guess. However, I love the fruits in open, wish I could smell them more in the dry down. The opening is like a 6/10. Dont turn off yet though, this stuff turns up in the dry down. Love the sweet cinnamon in there, still tickles my nose but I like wayyy better in the dry. This stuff is loudddd and projects a lot and lasts for a while as well. Sprayed this on a hoodie and it stayed for 2 days. 8/10 dry down</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2010322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2010322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But can be worn by an older person with its woody and cinnamon scent. A very good scent that Im going to wear at school</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2010226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2010226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008287" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2008287" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tfrag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1926123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tfrag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2008287ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2008287" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1926123">Tfrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 17:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with the comment below mine saying that it smells "off" a bit. Something generic or cheap smelling in it that I just don't care about, I only bought this 100ml bottle because it was 99% full an I paid 20$ for it from a friend who didn't care for it. It smells really sweet an boozy , I heard women like it but I haven't worn it enough to find out yet cause I don't really like it much myself but it's still An OK an decent fragrance if your into these kinds of scents. I give it a 3/5 it seems to smell strong an last a decent amount of time I'm sure the most wanted parfum is probably a better option. This Also smells like a party or night time type of fragrance, more suitable for fall an winter I'd assume also.<br />
<br />
EDIT: After wearing it a dozen times I'm starting to appreciate it more an understand where it's coming from a bit more an enjoy it. The dry down is a bit better than the opening but the scent doesn't change too much from start to finish. It projects big an lasts long even with 1 spray behind my ear i can smell it still after a 2 hour workout an sweating the whole time ,i also sprayed it on 2 hours before my workout I change my rating to 4.25/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2008287"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2008287#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007511" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007511" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MSKMAN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1301540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MSKMAN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-55785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau"title="Le Beau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007511ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007511" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301540">MSKMAN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-21">12/21/23 19:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I guess I am in the minority.  <br />
<br />
I wouldn't ever say I like this fragrance. Something about it smells "off" to me. I've tried some of the other flankers, which are fine, but there is something about wanted by night, which I do not enjoy.   Since I am so critical, I will try to wear it again this week.   If my opinion changes, I will edit or review it again. Overall, it's a strong pass, I think what I dislike the most is that is trying to be sweet yet overtly spicy and resinous in an unnatural sort of way.<br />
<br />
Update: My opinion hasn't changed after wearing it a few more times. I don't like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2007511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2007511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004991" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2004991" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentinal 1971"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1742027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1742027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentinal 1971" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2004991ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2004991" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1742027">Scentinal 1971</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-19">12/19/23 01:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my first lesson about the dangers of jumping on the 'hype train'. I have a few Azzaro fragrances and bought this due to the highly rated reviews I'd seen about how amazing it is. Sadly, I do not find anything amazing about Azzaro Wanted by Night. It is a headache inducing, syrupy thick mess of a fragrance with no redeemable features. I have tried to like this, I really have, but after using about .5% of the bottle it is now boxed away never to be used again. I can't say that it is the cinnamon note either, as I love other cinnamon forward fragrances- the original Obsession for example (now sadly discontinued). This smells like ramped up hyper synthetic amber, and not in a good way. If you are a teenager who thinks that loud sickly sweet spice is the way forward, you might well adore this, anyone else should stay clear!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2004991"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2004991#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002749" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TerreD&#039;Profumo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777045"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1777045.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TerreD&#039;Profumo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Elysium-Pour-Homme-Eau-Intense-81839.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81839.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Elysium Pour Homme Eau Intense"title="Elysium Pour Homme Eau Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002749ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002749" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777045">TerreD&#039;Profumo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-16">12/16/23 09:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The only words that could describe this is beautiful mess. You can track those notes above but the composition is simply chaos. It is sweet and sour roller coaster from opening to dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="2002749"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=2002749#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996867" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996867" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ISmellGood93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1832728.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ISmellGood93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Intense-2011-13016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Intense 2011"title="Dior Homme Intense 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996867ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996867" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832728">ISmellGood93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-09">12/09/23 11:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Debated for months on buying this, and then had to wait until stock showed back up, so I've been putting this one off for a while, and I should not have! It's amazing!<br />
<br />
I've sampled The Most Wanted, and I got too much fruit off of it for me, so I decided to blind buy this, and it's way different, I'm glad! <br />
<br />
It definitely has the kind of thick, fruity, bar vibe. I'm met with a spicy bit of cinnamon, bit of fruit, bit of smoke, kind of an outlaw gentleman if that makes sense. These notes mix together into something really nice!<br />
<br />
After a day of this scent on me, I am not sure if its nose blindness, or just the sillage and whatnot backing off over time, but I felt like it stopped lofting at me after maybe 4 hours or so. At the same time, I wear a number of scents like this, some feeling like they wear off though I know they're still going. I also was working pretty hard, so it could have just kinda came off through that I suppose. Will wear it more and see if its a performance thing or not. Regardless, I do love the way this smells. Keeper for sure!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1996867"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1996867#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I might have a bad batch or something but nothing about this feels heavy or dark.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1996456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1996456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Definitely not for me or anyone around me who smelled it either.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1991608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1991608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990294" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="s&amp;pscented"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326790"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1326790.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="s&amp;pscented" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326790">s&amp;pscented</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-01">12/01/23 22:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Synthetic cinnamon fruity bubblegum. I enjoy aspects of it, but theres a staleness to the fruity note that becomes off-putting in the dry-down, reminding me of dried spit. Maybe it just doesnt vibe with my skin chemistry. Smells better in the air rather than up close. If you are into younger clubbing-type fragrances, you will probably dig it. Performance is as good as people say. Apparently its discontinued (?), but you can still get it on discounter sites for a good price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1990294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1990294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986365" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985236" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="skettchy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1859596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="skettchy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985236ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985236" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859596">skettchy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-25">11/25/23 16:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just bought this for 50 dollars and I gotta say it is not what I expected but it was a nice surprise. It feels like you walked into a bar where you see an Italian mafia boss smoking cigars with his friends. At first it smells a bit like caramel chocolate tobacco and a bit of vanilla, it is a bit synthetic when I spray but that might just be my batch. the dry down smells like pure vanilla and tobacco. For me I don't smell the cinnamon at least not as much as the notes say but this is still worth it for under $100 better for winter than fall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1985225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1985225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984403" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1984403" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="uwuwood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202617.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="uwuwood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Lothair-27039.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27039.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lothair"title="Lothair"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1984403ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1984403" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202617">uwuwood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-24">11/24/23 15:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A diabolical fruit salad- first, a waft of berries that are not quite named, not quite known, then bam! Your baby cousin from your mom's side is sprinkling cumin in. The air smells like tobacco from the men in your family, smoking cigars indoors, while their wives rush around the house. This is the familiar smell of machismo- heady, assertive, a little rough around the edges. You don't stop your baby cousin because you hope his childish enthusiasm- for practical jokes and for life- may be contagious. He's doing the cinnamon challenge and coughing directly into the mixing bowl. He gives you a mischievous, challenging grin. You smile back. It's tooth-achingly sweet. 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1984403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1984403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983426" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983426" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zeni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1855988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="zeni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983426ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983426" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1855988">zeni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-23">11/23/23 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>EDIT <br />
<br />
Its been around 5 months or so and it getss better. Of the cap i still get this very wierd cinnamon fruity baby wipes. On skin its very complex and way better, no were near fruity baby wipes. Its lightly  sweet and i still get alot of spices and cinnamon<br />
<br />
Over all 8.1<br />
:/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1983426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1983426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1982534" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1982534" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sirjuab410"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896887"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1896887.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sirjuab410" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Baccarat-Rouge-540-Extrait-de-Parfum-46066.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46066.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baccarat Rouge 540 Extrait de Parfum"title="Baccarat Rouge 540 Extrait de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1982534ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1982534" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896887">sirjuab410</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-22">11/22/23 06:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine walking into an old-fashion style of bar and see this James Dean looking guy sitting there alone with a glass of rocked straight bourbon with a cigarette on the other hand of him. This is it, this is the feeling, the scent you will feel walking pass by that type of man, that you'll forget James Dean was ever gay.<br />
Absolutely tremendous scent of the sexy, masculine yet outstanding wearer, brilliant sillage and longevity with super affordable price, this will go to my top favorite fragrances of all time.<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1982534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1982534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1979090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1979090" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuperHurleyMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262042"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuperHurleyMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1979090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1979090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262042">SuperHurleyMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-17">11/17/23 16:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My most favorite, my signature scent, my most complimented fragrance. I don't think I will find anything that surpasses the love I have for Wanted by Night. First sniff, strong cinnamon and orange followed by a cumin note that quickly dissipates 30 minutes in. In the middle, I still smell the cinnamon alongside a strong, sweet tobacco that showcases how manly this fragrance really is. When the finality hits, the cinnamon takes a backseat and a rich cedar alongside the tobacco takes the final stage. WBN is arguably the best bang for your buck; it's the strongest and longest lasting fragrance that I have in my collection. Sillage over 6 feet for at least 5 hours, can still smell my arm 12+ hours later, all for prices that are considered for, "cheapies." <br />
<br />
11 out of 10, would smell again</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1979090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1979090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1976260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353041">Cdub5_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-31">10/31/23 17:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have slept on this line from Azzaro for way too long.  The only Azzaro's I tried were ones from the Chrome line.  Not impressed.<br />
I purchased a sample of Wanted by Night several years ago.  Honestly, didn't care for it too much at the time, but I was new and I was trying tons of fragrances in a short period of time, so it got lost in the shuffle.<br />
I recently reached waaaay back in my collection and happened to pull out this 10ml sample.  I tried it and that sweet cinnamon instantly got my attention.  As the initial wearing went on my love for this fragrance solidified.  I am totally in love with this!! I can't put it down. I have already purchased 2 backup bottles and don't plan on stopping.  I have The Most Wanted EDP Intense and the Most Wanted Parfum on the way, too. I have high hopes for them as well.<br />
Finding absolute loves like this gem is what keeps my fragrance passion going as strong as it is.  It's crazy that one of my true loves was hiding under my nose amongst a brand that I snubbed for the longest time.  <br />
Awesome stuff!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1965459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1965459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1962307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 5. Great price compared to what it provides</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1955188"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1955188#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1952676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1952676" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yallah Lee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1837089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yallah Lee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1952676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1952676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1837089">Yallah Lee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-15">10/15/23 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very good smell with good longivity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1952676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1952676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1952275" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1952275" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fortyfree"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1631067.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fortyfree" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1952275ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1952275" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067">Fortyfree</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-15">10/15/23 05:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens warm and spicy; strong cardamom and tobacco notes. <br />
<br />
It's dark, quite musty. <br />
<br />
It then sweetens and notes of apple and spiced plumb are perceptible. Also has some cinnamon. Smells "X-massy."<br />
<br />
Remains fruity, becomes boozy.<br />
<br />
There's vanilla in the drydown mixed with some woodsy notes. <br />
<br />
Performance is good. Projection ok, not too strong. Longevity is solid, lasts as a skin scent 6+hrs. <br />
<br />
This fragrance would suit a man in their mid-20's, all the way up to about 60, IMO. <br />
<br />
Best for the colder months. Not hugely versatile though. As the name would suggest this is always going to work better in the evening. <br />
<br />
Overall I think it's pretty decent when considering the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1952275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1952275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dom Positano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1551401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1551401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dom Positano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Aoud-Exclusif-51493.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51493.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aoud Exclusif"title="Aoud Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1551401">Dom Positano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-12">10/12/23 02:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The synthetic sweetness and cumin combination ruin this fragrance. I think it's fine to have those in the fragrance but they overwhelm other notes. I wish this leant more into the tobacco, incense and cinnamon. The sweetness is sickly. The spices don't come across in a sexy way.<br />
<br />
This is a pleasant smell but it's not suitable for a person to wear, it would suit a candle or something like that. <br />
<br />
I wish it wasn't like this as I liked it initially but the more I wear it the more I realise its not a great fragrance. It pains me to say that as I hate wasting my money. I didn't even buy it blind.<br />
<br />
I'm afraid the smell is a lot like the bottle. Cheap and gimmicky. At first I thought the bottle was cool too but the more you look at it and hold it you realise it's like a cheap plastic toy. That's kinda how it smells, like a cheap plastic toy.<br />
<br />
I can only imagine 16 year old boys liking this thinking the grls would love it but they more than likely don't.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1949844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1949844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949209" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ryanmmas26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.761961.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ryanmmas26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-Le-Parfum-91693.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91693.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"title="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949209ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949209" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961">Ryanmmas26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-11">10/11/23 07:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent has gone from a like to a LOVE as simply put this is a Fall in a bottle type of scent and in the drydown reminds me of a handsoap from Bath and Body works called Autumn leaves.<br />
<br />
On my skin Wanted by Night has 4 stages !..<br />
<br />
Wanted by Night has a strange and muddled opening that Im not exactly a fan as theres many different notes clashing that just is slightly off putting (in the opening you can detect its a wanted flanker but quickly changes )<br />
<br />
2nd stage-In about a minute this quickly gets better and sorts itself out and you do get a slight hint of the bubblegum sweetness from the OG but mixed with some richness of the tobacco,cinnamon,cypress and incense ! This stage is really nice and has some solid projection and is a nice balance of something youthful and mature. This lasts about an hour<br />
<br />
3rd stage - This is my favorite part of the fragrance as the cinnamon and  tobacco are the main players along side the citrus but you still oddly enough get that orange note for a very long time. This phase usually lasts until your 4.<br />
<br />
4th stage - in this stage the citrus has faded and pretty much what your left with is a strong cinnamon note with the benzoin but it smells very  much like vanilla and the tobacco is there faintly in the background. <br />
<br />
( Pretty much this a sweet cinnamon dominant fragrance so if you dont like cinnamon then Id avoid this)<br />
<br />
Performance is excellent-as even with 1 spray you get moderate projection and sillage so be cautious with this !!! It also lasts me consistently about 10-12 hours !! <br />
<br />
( This has gotten good unsolicited attention but also I did have 1 friend that noted that she liked this in the air but up close it was very strong and not as pleasant up close so use with caution as most people will like this but its a scent that some may not) <br />
<br />
Overall rating -8.75 out of 10 ! I personally love this but not an all time favorite however Im in love with the Cinnamon and tobacco in this and Wanted by Night has replaced Burberry London as my new festive scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1949209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1949209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945461" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brenna123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846238"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1846238.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="brenna123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846238">brenna123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 07:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>dont listen to these fools. this is an amazing fragrance. not bubblegummy at all. perfect blend of spicy and sweetines. a must have for fall and winter</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1945461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1945461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1943458" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pacific-Chill-81423.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81423.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pacific Chill"title="Pacific Chill"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1943458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1943458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-03">10/03/23 14:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An interesting take on the Azzaro Wanted DNA.<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
Opening is fruity, spicy, and slightly woody/smokey. I can easily pick up the fruit notes and cinnamon, with the incense and cedar in the background. In the dry down the fruit notes are still there along with the spiciness from the cinnamon and smokiness from the incense, but the wood and tobacco notes have become more prominent.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection is strong at around 6 feet, and sillage leaves a very long scent trail, at least 10 feet. The projection and sillage fall off pretty quickly though. After an hour or two, projection has died down to about arms length, and there's only a slight scent trail left. Altogether the scent lasted on my skin about 8 hours.<br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
In my opinion the bright fruit notes along with the spice, woods, and sweet vanilla notes make this an all season, day or night fragrance.<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
I would say this is a safe blind buy if you like sweet/spicy/woody fragrances. Nothing about it comes across as polarizing.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
If you like the Wanted line, but want something a little different than TMW and TMW Parfum, add this one to your collection. However, this fragrance seems to be increasingly difficult to find, making me believe it could be discontinued. It's not so mind-blowing that I would recommend spending a lot of money on it, but if you can get it for a good price go for it.<br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Longevity: 7/10<br />
Sillage: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1943458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1943458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1942116" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iam_iSMELL"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1417823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iam_iSMELL" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1942116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1942116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417823">iam_iSMELL</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-01">10/01/23 20:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive heard from a couple reliable sources within the fragrance community that Wanted by Night has indeed been officially discontinued.<br />
From my understanding Azzaro will still have 2023 batches to be distributed, however. <br />
<br />
Wanted by Night is my favorite out of the line, it stands out as the most unique, even though the sweetness is very much in line with the modern designer trend of fragrances; theres still something in it that is noticeably unique. <br />
<br />
As it relates to the scent profile of Wanted by Night what I get is bright fruity-sweet cinnamon up top, herbal aromatics amidst some tobacco thru the mid, and then the stereotypical amberwoody drydown that is the trend of 99% of mass-appealing designer offerings as of late. <br />
<br />
I can definitely see the appeal, and why so many people swear by this fragrance. I can also understand why women would like it due to its sweet (but also seductively unique) sillage.<br />
<br />
Personally, its not my favorite fragrance of all time, and doubt it will ever be my first choice to reach for in my fall/winter rotation ~ having said that as someone who appreciates having variety in my collection it will get the same type of wear for the same type of occasions that I would reach for Eros Parfum. <br />
Its a good grab and go type of fragrance when you want to smell good yet dont want to think about it all that hard. <br />
<br />
Do feel for the people who are in love with this fragrance, as I do see this being the type of fragrance that will be hard to acquire under $125 here in like 4 years.<br />
<br />
Thanks for reading everyone yall be blessed <br />
<br />
If you made it this far please consider checking out my YouTube channel ~ would love the opportunity to try and warn your sub. Dont have the most expensive collection of all time, but I do provide honest and authentic opinions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1942116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1942116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1938673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1938673" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kakasuke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1487890"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kakasuke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1938673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1938673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); <br />
The dry down is musky, dark and mysterious. It lasts and that is definitely not a bad thing as I love all aspects of this scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1938673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1938673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1937999" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; GOOD DOSE OF CINNAMON and sweetness. Really nice for kinda of cold weather.  <br />
<br />
Mid has a mild talc powder and tobacco feel. <br />
Fresh yet amber yet sexy. 8.5/10 good silage and projection.<br />
<br />
CLOSE CALLS: SWY, CH MAN PRIVE,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1937452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1937452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1933476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
The scent isn't cloying on the nose at all, it's a very light and masculine sweet scent. The fruity notes took me off guard at first but it WORKS.<br />
<br />
10/10 Autumn &amp; Winter Smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1927218"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1927218#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1926596" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
