padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515487">hussrahal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-12">09/12/23 23:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this entire line, but this to me is STILL the best. <br />
This just stands out and is pretty different, this is one of my favorite designers ever made. <br />
Good performance on top of an amazing scent.<br />
10/10 to me. Banger!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1926596"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1926596#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1924785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1924785" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Funky_Monk1988"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591954"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1591954.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Funky_Monk1988" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1924785ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1924785" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591954">Funky_Monk1988</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-10">09/10/23 17:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Anyone else have a loose sitting cap on their bottle? My MW bottle has a  tighter sitting cap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1924785"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1924785#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923532" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923532" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="the_Scentsei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411891"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1411891.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="the_Scentsei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923532ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923532" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1411891">the_Scentsei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-09">09/09/23 06:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I'm super duper curious as to where you folks get this discontinued news...<br />
<br />
This is one of my first loves. I got this early in my journey. I went and put a heavy dose on right now. I have a 100ml bottle paid for ($68.36 after tax) and sitting in my cart. I'm gonna take a stroll and see if this fruity, cinnamon, spicy beast is still acceptable to my more refined nose. <br />
<br />
The sense of smell...what a thing. You sure don't have any control on how it develops and perceives the world. I've have thrown out (I'm not passing on future headache bombs) or given away a TON of my early "awesome" frags in the last month. Things like Montblanc Individuel...one time that powdery showery frag was nice...now? I have given away two brand new bottles. <br />
<br />
Enough time to walk and see if I cancel the order or if I still LOVE this one...<br />
<br />
UPDATE: It's a keeper...<br />
<br />
Final Sniffs:<br />
Unique: 9/10 I certainly haven't smelled an abundance of frags but this doesn't smell like anything else I have.<br />
Projection: 8.5/10 it's carried on the breeze very nicely.<br />
Longevity: 9/10 it's got legs for SURE. <br />
Verdict: 9.5/10 this is so good. I truly love it. I'd recommend that you folks buy up what you can while you can<br />
<br />
I'd recommend that if you decide to wear this in the heat stay away from overloading. It may give you a headache. It's happened once to me. That one time STILL worries me as I'm about to buy more...<br />
<br />
Edit: I bought it. This is a masterful creation by Quentin Bisch. That dude makes some BANGERS. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1923532"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1923532#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923438" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Got extremely luck with the last bottle at a discounter.<br />
This fragrance is extremely close to my heart as this is the fragrance that got me into collecting fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1923438"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1923438#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923107" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So if that's true, better grab your backup bottles asap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1923068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1923068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1919186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1919186" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cinnabomb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1496507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cinnabomb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/L-Homme-Cologne-Bleue-48308.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48308.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Cologne Bleue"title="LHomme Cologne Bleue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1919186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1919186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496507">Cinnabomb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-04">09/04/23 00:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet and fruity opening, drying down into a bubblegum-sweet tobacco. Long-lasting and good sillage, but always synthetic. <br />
I've owned this for about a year and worn it on and off. It's never been my favourite, but I'm liking it less and less as time goes on. I just can't help feeling kinda douchey when I wear it. I think it's probably better suited to a younger guy (under 35).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1919186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1919186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1916945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1916945" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankcoelho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankcoelho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/L-Immensite-49751.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49751.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LImmensit "title="LImmensit "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1916945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1916945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325">frankcoelho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-01">09/01/23 07:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A different signature for a man.<br />
 Really, I am not a freshie fan. Sweetness and mystery are much more attention grabbing, both to myself and others. Freshies are usually more of the same with a twist. Now, THIS IS DIFFERENT.<br />
 Perfect for fall and winter, I still prefer wearing this during the day during spring and summer. It is a "cheapie" (price have crept up a lot, putting it close tot he most wanted subline).<br />
 I wouldn't pay over $70 bucks for it, but it's still worth the buy. Great performance and quite different and sexy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1916945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1916945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1913630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; One of my most favorite fragrances 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1881293"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1881293#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1879311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Overall though, less sweet than the other flankers in the line and feels as if its more "mature" if that's even a thing. I will say though, the performance on this is great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1879311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1879311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1876962" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Actually the performance and projection compared to the nowadays lineup is 9/10.<br />
<br />
The taste of the scent let's say 8.5, it is masculine, clean quality notes, a bit sweet, but good balance for date night.<br />
<br />
Overall I give 9, coz every perfume should perform and last long like this with similar quality of notes!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1873183"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1873183#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1873075" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1388088">astrid1057</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-05">07/05/23 22:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not much to say except Im grateful for fragrantica. I was helping my boyfriend find a new cologne and used his favourite notes to find Wanted by Night (initially Spicebomb Nightvision EDT and Invictus Platinum peaked his interest). Compared to those and everything else he tried, this was both our favourite and he wears it everyday now. I think it would be too overwhelming for a hot day but perfect for winter or date night. Its not my favourite of all time, but I do enjoy smelling it and have nothing negative to say. Also prefer this to the OG wanted scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1872248"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1872248#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866841" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1866841" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monsieur.moustache"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monsieur.moustache" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1866841ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1866841" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574">monsieur.moustache</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-28">06/28/23 18:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pleasant spicy fragrance suitable for fall/winter. It's good, but not as good as Most Wanted.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1866841"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1866841#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1865351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1865351" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="davidramos555"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1441264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="davidramos555" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mizensir/Perfect-Oud-39219.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39219.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perfect Oud"title="Perfect Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1865351ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1865351" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441264">davidramos555</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-26">06/26/23 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is weird for me, definitely not the same juice that I once knew. To my nose its been reformulated HEAVILY! <br />
<br />
Now, all I get is a Fruity (almost grapeish) bubblegum scent. Id give this away, not worthy to stay in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1865351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1865351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1861404" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1861404" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gospodinov_s"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1015689.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gospodinov_s" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-Fantasm-93266.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93266.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men Fantasm"title="A*Men Fantasm"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1861404ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1861404" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015689">gospodinov_s</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-21">06/21/23 08:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin it feels great... the fruits are not so sweet, there is also an edgy barbershop side ... both combined are giving the uniqueness of this juice. A bit of downside is the opening where is this typical mix or cinnamon- zitrus- lavender blend, that we are all tired of and is everywhere. After a wild fruits are coming in a mix with cedar, cumin, benzoin ... and it starts to show the real face of the best fragrance in this series the "wanted" , IMO. The connection with 1 Million is not 100% direct ... there is one Zegna perfume , the Snaghai(2016), that is closer to this one and was far better then 1Mil. and some of its flankers. If someone is searching here tabacco , vanilla and leather in some real clean and unique presentation -just forget it. Nice performance and development ... enjoyable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1861404"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1861404#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1856911" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1856911" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FaheemFuckingRyan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1506823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FaheemFuckingRyan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1856911ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1856911" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506823">FaheemFuckingRyan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-15">06/15/23 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a mixture of 1 million Parfum x The one EDP.<br />
Too sweet and overpowering!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1856911"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1856911#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1855279" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1855279" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mrtbrcnl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mrtbrcnl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1855279ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1855279" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676041">Mrtbrcnl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-13">06/13/23 07:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azzaro Wanted by Night is a bold and versatile fragrance with a dominant orange and cinnamon opening that not everyone can love. This perfume should not be worn in summer.  It has a spicy, sugary orange marmalade vibe, modern yet chic. Its longevity is excellent, lasting up to eight hours with strong projection during the first two hours. However, caution is advised due to the strong cinnamon note, which can be overwhelming initially. It is not suitable for formal or daytime settings and the strong cumin may repel some people. Overall, a masculine, attention-grabbing fragrance.<br />
Although I like it as a fragrance style, it is not a perfume for blind buying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1855279"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1855279#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1854334" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1854334" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IceMell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="IceMell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Beach-Hut-Man-46336.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46336.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beach Hut Man"title="Beach Hut Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1854334ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1854334" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685536">IceMell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-11">06/11/23 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While "all" the notes are there from the beginning in the opening, with all of that sensory overload the first thing I get is the tobacco and the smokiness of the incense.  It's sweet from the vanilla-benzoin-Iso E combo, but not too sweet. The cinnamon and citrus are there from the beginning, and I begin to notice them right after the smoky tobacco and sweetness.  As it moves to the mid, the citrus tones down a little for me and the cinnamon is joined by fruitiness and cumin, but the cinnamon is still very strong to my nose.  The vanilla gradually gets stronger and the woods get warmer as time goes by. I only notice the leather because it's mentioned in the notes, and it's the very sweet kind that practically blends in with the vanilla and tobacco.  Good thing, too, because I hate strong leather notes.  The drydown is a little less sweet on my skin, but I still get cinnamon, vanilla, tobacco and woods.  Projection is 2-3 feet for me, and the scent lasts 6-7 hours, with a couple more hours as a skin scent.  Holds up well in 75 degrees and under, and the more under that the better.  Personally, I would not wear it in weather warner than that, or if I was going to be very active.<br />
<br />
For me, this leans closer to Wanted than The Most Wanted flankers.  Like Wanted, this one is woody and spicy, though this one is less fresh and closer to a classic oriental woody spicy, which is my favorite style of cologne. It's less sweet than its "Most" brothers, and a different spice leading the spiciness.  Those are richer and much more gourmand in nature compared to this one.  Still, I love the whole line and find that the different scents are useful for different things.  If I had to pick one, it's this one.  But I don't, so I have them all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1854334"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1854334#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1851180" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1851180" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Orion78"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1751293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Orion78" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1851180ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1851180" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1751293">Orion78</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-07">06/07/23 10:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yes! For 5months of waiting bec. Its always sold out Finally its in my hands now. For me 1st spray just wow! love the scent and when its dry down love it so smooth. I hates over power leather smell, but this blend so well, not over power by the leather. Of all the Azzaro Wanted line, for me this is the best #1! Thats why its always sold-out. BTW i blind buy this bec. of the reviews and never regret buying this perfume.<br />
100/10 for me </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1851180"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1851180#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1850186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1850186" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EauDeParFARM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="EauDeParFARM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1850186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1850186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765593">EauDeParFARM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-06">06/06/23 04:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my first ever fragrance purchase and boy was this a start of something amazing.<br />
<br />
I finally decided to plunge straight into the realm of fragrances as I wanted to elevate myself from the rest and get that edge. All it was that sparked my journey into fragrances was put simply, a night time clubbing/partying/dinner occasion that I really wanted to make an impression and really got for the win.<br />
<br />
All I did was do about 10min of research (thanks JeremyFragrance) and my local chemist actually had this and it was on a massive sale. All I can say I was this is some delicious Cinammon yumminess that really pumps you up for the night. I never wore a fragrance until I wore this and it delivered! I was quite easily noticed and was well received from both my male and female friends. Ive never been complimented about my smell before and this was a game changer and confidence booster. <br />
<br />
This is definitely a fragrance for the night or for the colder seasons as it is very pungent and powerful but the scent profile of the cinnamon and the sweet power masculinity it brings is awesome! I would very much so recommend this and good news is that it isnt too expensive!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1850186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1850186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849935" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1849935" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Peanutboy7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765371"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1765371.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Peanutboy7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1849935ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1849935" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765371">Peanutboy7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-05">06/05/23 19:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very interesting blend of spicy scents, wanted by night in my opinion is the best out of the wanted collection (yes, even better than the most wanted). I fell in love with the fragrance the first moment I smelled it and I have had no regrets ever since. However, if you spray too much of it, it can definitely give a nauseating smell that can induce a headache, which is why I do not spray this near the front. 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1849935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1849935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1844808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1844808" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SAMPSODX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378154.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SAMPSODX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1844808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1844808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378154">SAMPSODX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-30">05/30/23 00:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive owned this since 2019. For me this has a bit of everything. Its a fougere, but its also fruity, then its also woody, its a bit citrusy, and also a bit smooth with the vanilla. <br />
<br />
Cold nights out only, which is probably why its lasted me so long in a warm Australian climate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1844808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1844808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1843419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1843419" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="razorsedge"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="razorsedge" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1843419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1843419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247086">razorsedge</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-28">05/28/23 03:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love it!<br />
Spicy cinnamon and sweet fruit. Not cloying. Reminds me of Spicebomb and Stronger With You Intensely. Some "evening date night" fragrances of this accord might feel out of place outside of these situations, but I really enjoy having a spicy frag like Wanted By Night that is sort of universal.<br />
Longevity is also good, lasts better part of the day on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1843419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1843419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1838935" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Good for cold weather only, night outs or dates. It smells nice and sexy, i feel like it had potential but unfortunately it is overly sweet, synthetic and headache inducing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1838935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1838935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1838367" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1838367" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="justinmartini314"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441324"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="justinmartini314" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1838367ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1838367" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441324">justinmartini314</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-21">05/21/23 05:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first, I wasn't blown away by this one as it kind of just smelled like a fall candle to me. However, the more and more I smelt it the more I warmed up to it and eventually bought a bottle. It really is a cozy comforting smell that puts you into the fall/winter mood. I think this is a great Christmas scent as well. I like how it isn't a room filler either. Sometimes room fillers aren't the most wearable in most situations but this one is a nice and tame whilst having decent longevity. The cinnamon in this one is gorgeous and is definitely the star of the show. Overall solid. 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1838367"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1838367#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1834628" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1834628" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yyswear2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1720868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yyswear2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1834628ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1834628" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720868">yyswear2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-16">05/16/23 13:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beast mode. This is the perfume with the longest duration of my collection. It's a very beautiful, very fruity and sweet fragrance, it looks a bit like an oasis-type fruity drink. that's what he reminds me of. It's really a very beautiful fragrance, really very understated (few people wear it) that lasts for days on the skin (at least 2 days on my neck). One of my most complimented perfumes, no doubt about it. It could have been one of my favorite perfumes if only the bottle wasn't so ugly. You can smell the tobacco at the end of the liqueur's life, it's very beautiful. 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1834628"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1834628#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1833836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
