padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1833215" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="auztie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1556309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="auztie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1833215ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1833215" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556309">auztie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-14">05/14/23 21:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like lavender apple to me. All I can think of is apple when I spray this. Tends to give me a headache. Smells CHEAP. Never got many compliments from this one. Definitely don't blind buy like me! 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1833215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1833215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1828199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1828199" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dibsr97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740307"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dibsr97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1828199ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1828199" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740307">dibsr97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-08">05/08/23 20:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a huge let down for me after all the hype it gets. I was really keen to try this predominantly for the cinnamon, and I get none of it. Good thing I only picked up a sample.<br />
<br />
It's overwhelmingly synthetic, sweet and fruity. Tough to pick apart notes - all just sort of muddles together to create a generic bubblegum like scent. Perhaps the mandarin/orange stands out the most. Lacks any complexity and depth on my skin. If there's other stuff there, it's extremely faint and not balanced.<br />
<br />
Has a similar sort of sweetness akin to One Million - if you're into that, you'll enjoy this. Not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1828199"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1828199#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827465" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1827465" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="storif"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740101"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="storif" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1827465ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1827465" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740101">storif</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-07">05/07/23 23:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Best fragrance in my whole collection. Fuckin delicious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1827465"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1827465#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1824606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1824606" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentinal 1971"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1742027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1742027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentinal 1971" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1824606ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1824606" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1742027">Scentinal 1971</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-04">05/04/23 06:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Much lauded by the fragrance community, I purchased this several months ago. I have a few Azzaro fragrances including  Pour Homme, Shine (which I adore wearing when it's sunny weather) and the rare but unique 'Visit'. I was so looking forward to receiving Wanted by night only to be genuinely let down by what, to my nose at least, is a headache inducing uber-synthetic treacle of a scent. I guess that the 'wanted' line is Azzaro's 'crowd pleaser' group of fragrances, but to me it lacks refinement and has a heavy, thick scent profile out of which I can discern absolutely none of the notes listed here!  despite several attempts to 'like' this fragrance, my bottle remains 99% full and is in a box awaiting sale to anyone who can appreciate it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1824606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1824606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="49144" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1224930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1224930" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nobody.Really"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1082404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1082404.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nobody.Really" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Profumo-34761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Profumo"title="Armani Code Profumo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1224930ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1224930" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1082404">Nobody.Really</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-15">09/15/20 22:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the Culture<br />
<br />
Azzaro Wanted by Night was received so very well by the community that one who hasnt smelled the original would likely imagine the two to be vastly different  and they would be quite mistaken.  <br />
<br />
Surely the original Azzaro Wanted is fresher, but the overall scent structure is actually very much intact.  If you enjoyed the original, I cant gather how you would not enjoy Wanted by Night, and vice versa.  Alas, I digress.  .  .  . <br />
<br />
Wanted by Night shares the same realm as the multitude of conventional date night fragrances, such as Dolce &amp; Gabbanas The One, and The One EDP, being both warm, sweet, spicy, and sitting relatively close to the skin after application  although, Id be remiss if I didnt applaud Wanted by Night for its superior performance as it pertains to longevity.  Whereas with many of  the typical come hither fragrances the product is rather fleeting, with Wanted by Night, the scent has the staying power to last you well into the next morning if the need arises.  <br />
<br />
Wanted by Night is dominated by the orange at the top, along with the cinnamon, and everything else within the provided note breakdown seems to cling to the patchouli, and ISO E Super molecule in vestigial amounts, providing an apparent, though vague sweetness that lends itself less towards a ripe orange, and more towards what would be a spicy, sugary orange marmalade.  Having said that, theres something about the composition that prevents it from meandering aimlessly into the territory of gourmand, while imbuing the fragrance with an air of slight modernity, and class.  Stated plainly:  it smells as if you were daring enough, you could eat it, but its clear you should not.  <br />
<br />
As I mentioned before, there is nothing to be desired in the performance category.  You can expect at least eight hours, with strong projection for at least two hours.  Youd do especially well not to immediately make your departure after application, though:  the cinnamon in this fragrance is loud, and while it may very well cause the wearer to go anosmic quickly, others could easily be overwhelmed within the first thirty minutes.  I mention this, because it is very likely that if you drive to your date, during your time in the closed vehicle, you could cause an encounter where the fragrance could be cloying or offensive.  Because I love you I will advise you to allow the fragrance to dry down before beginning your evening.  Fret not.  The fragrance is somewhat linear, so that lucky someone will not miss much.<br />
<br />
In the end, Wanted by Night is quite lovely.  By no stretch of the imagination is it a paradigm shattering masterpiece, but it is undoubtedly a great staple in any enthusiasts collection  capable of being worn any evening not exceeding 80 Fahrenheit.<br />
<br />
For me, it is a 8.5/10.  I enjoy this.  <br />
<br />
On a side note: I want you to stay safe, stay healthy, and I wish you the best.  See you around, superstar.  Be easy.<br />
<br />
<br />
Very Sincerely &amp; Respectfully Yours,<br />
<br />
Nobody.Really</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1224930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1224930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent935824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc935824" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="007peter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1079008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="007peter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma935824ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd935824" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079008">007peter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-04-23">04/23/18 21:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>*************************************************************<br />
<b>2018 Club Banger</b>: drawn out JPG UltraMale<br />
*************************************************************<br />
I just came back from Macy with a 1-singel-spray on my left arm, and it drawn out 2 sprays of (JPG UltraMale) on my right arm, and completely erased 4 spray of (MontBlanc Legend Night) on my left wrist.  I thought the original Azzaro Wanted was strong, the new Wanted-by-Night is <b>Nuclear!</b><br />
<br />
**************************************************<br />
Cumin is really Strong &amp; overbearing for me<br />
**************************************************<br />
This cologne Scream SEX + Scream Attention + Demands Confidence.  This is a I-want-to-get-FUCK tonight fragrance without any pretense.  I highly Respect this fragrance for its Beastly projection + attention grabbing ability.  However, keep in mind it's:<br />
<br />
- highly inappropriate for office or work<br />
- highly inappropriate for business gala or special events<br />
- highly inappropriate for Summer or Daylight<br />
- more powerful than women's perfume<br />
- more projection than a deadly napalm <br />
- can be highly offensive in family dinner<br />
- can be repulse some women (due to overly strong cumin)<br />
+ can also be SEXY to the right women ;-)<br />
<br />
This is the Gangster Fragrance.  I feel like I should be rocking a Wife-beater-Tank-Top with a manly Leather Jacket, finished up with a shining Gold Chain with a pair of douchy sunglasses. This is a highly Masculine (Bad Boy) fragrance.  Not for any suit &amp; ties financial guys.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="935824"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=935824#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1181533" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1181533" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="piyux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230413"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230413.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="piyux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Intense-2011-13016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Intense 2011"title="Dior Homme Intense 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1181533ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1181533" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230413">piyux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-28">05/28/20 19:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azzaro Wanted by Night EDP opens with a strong projection of sweet, spicy, citrus, smoky, and fruity notes. The opening is bold, delectable, inviting, intense, unique, and versatile. The cinnamon, mandarin orange, fruity notes, and incense are the prominent opening notes. The mandarin orange and fruity notes give this fragrance its delectable, fruity, citrusy, and very sweet accord; the cinnamon sits by their side with a noticeable sweet, warm, powdery, spicy, and delectable touch. The incense is one small step behind but growing fast; smoky, dark, burnt wood, and projecting, not churchy. As time passes, the incense gains strength, closely followed by a tobacco note. The tobacco in this fragrance is mild, noticeable but not pungent or dark; it blends well with the incense creating a masculine and bold accord. The next group notes provide support; the vanilla, benzoin, ISO-E Super, cedar, cumin, leather, and patchouli are part of this group. The vanilla and benzoin are prominent, warm, resinous, dense, honey, and sweet. The cedar and ISO-E Super also have modest participation, a fresh woody accord. The leather is a projecting note but lacks a specific accord. All other notes remain in the back of the fragrance. The fragrance has a noticeable opening to dry down. The opening is delectable, sharp, moist, mostly spicy, citrusy, sour, sweet, and fruity. Towards the dry down, the mandarin orange and lemon lose some intensity, the incense and tobacco grow, the vanilla and benzoin add an ambery sweetness; the initial sharpness smooths out, the fragrance becomes dry, and the incense boosts the fragrance. Once Azzaro Wanted by Night EDP has reached its full dry down, it can be summarized as a moderate projection, very sweet, spicy cinnamon, fruity, smoky incense, tobacco, resinous benzoin, vanilla, and woody fragrance with spicy, green, and citrus notes. The fragrance feels ambery, bold, casual, comforting, cozy, delectable, dense, dry, elegant, exotic, fruity, inviting, masculine, mild, moderate-quality, modern, nicely-blended, nocturnal, playful, resinous, rich, short-lived, smoky, sweet, warm, woody, and very pleasant.<br />
<br />
BATCH REVIEWED: 2020 (#0937170)<br />
WOW RATING: 9/10. A great sweet, spicy, smoky tobacco, resinous, and woody fragrance.<br />
DISLIKE RATING: 1/10. The fragrance is sweet.<br />
UNIQUENESS: 8/10. The notes are common; the resulting scent has a unique touch.<br />
MASS APPEAL: 9/10. Sweet fruits, vanilla, benzoin, the fragrance is delicious, a crowd-pleaser.<br />
PROJECTION: 4/10. Moderate, about 4 feet around the wearer.<br />
SILLAGE: 4/10. Moderate, about four feet behind the wearer.<br />
APPLICATION: 4 atomizations.<br />
LONGEVITY: 4/10. About 4 hours. It projects well for about 2 hours.<br />
SEASONS: Winter, spring, summer, fall, colder days, daytime, nighttime, and climate-controlled environments.<br />
OCCASIONS: Formal events, outdoor gatherings, office, casual, holidays, vacations, romantic, dating, clubbing. This is an office-friendly fragrance. <br />
VERSATILITY: 7/10. A great fragrance for casual wear, mild or cold weather.<br />
GENDER: Masculine. Its spicy, tobacco, and smoky notes lean it to the masculine side.<br />
AGES: Any.<br />
RECOMMENDATION: Azzaro Wanted by Night can be found discounted for under $40. Its longevity could be better, but other than that, it delivers a great value for its price, bold, unique, and delectable. This is a great buy.<br />
BLIND-BUY: Yes, but only if you are familiar with its main notes.<br />
SIMILAR: These are examples of other fragrances in the same genre.<br />
	Animale Animale EDT Men is a very good, very sweet, fruity, floral, green, tobacco fragrance.<br />
	Aquolina Steel Sugar EDT is a good, mild, sweet, tobacco, gingerbread, spicy, and ambery fragrance.<br />
	Azzaro Pour Homme Ginger Lover EDT is a very good, mild, sweet, spicy ginger, green vetiver, and lime fragrance.<br />
	Baldessarini Nautic Spirit is a sweet, passion fruit, mango, and spicy fragrance.<br />
	Calvin Klein CK One Shock EDT is a good, mild, dark tobacco, sweet ambery, spicy, cardamom, patchouli, and dark woods fragrance.<br />
	Diesel Only The Brave Extreme EDT is OK, mild, a very sweet, resinous, tonka, styrax, leather, and labdanum fragrance.<br />
	Ferrari Scuderia Forte EDP Men is a great and versatile fruity, cinnamon, and woody fragrance.<br />
	John Varvatos EDT Men is OK, a faint, sweet, vanilla, caramel, fruity tamarind, dates, and ambery fragrance.<br />
	Mandarina Duck Black EDT is a very good, mild, delicious, mandarin, and tonka bean fragrance.<br />
	Parfums De Marly Herod EDP Men is a great, intense, sweet, tobacco, smokey incense, vanilla, and spicy fragrance.<br />
	Solo Loewe Esencial EDT Men is a good, very sweet, mint, spicy, woody, smoky, and citrusy fragrance.<br />
	Viktor &amp; Rolf Spicebomb Extreme EDP Men is a very good, unique, strong, vanilla, tobacco, pepper, and caraway fragrance.<br />
	Viktor &amp; Rolf Spicebomb Night Vision EDT Men is a very good, sweet tonka, green mandarin, green apple, spicy chili pepper, sage, and cardamom fragrance.<br />
	Zadig &amp; Voltaire This Is Him, is a good, sweet, vanilla, sandalwood, and incense fragrance.<br />
	Azzaro Wanted by Night EDP is a great, very sweet, spicy cinnamon, fruity, smoky incense, tobacco, resinous benzoin, vanilla, and woody fragrance.<br />
SUMMARY: A moderate projection, very sweet, spicy cinnamon, fruity, smoky incense, tobacco, resinous benzoin, vanilla, and woody fragrance with spicy, green, and citrus notes. The fragrance feels ambery, bold, casual, comforting, cozy, delectable, dense, dry, elegant, exotic, fruity, inviting, masculine, mild, moderate-quality, modern, nicely-blended, nocturnal, playful, resinous, rich, smoky, sweet, warm, woody, and very pleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1181533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1181533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent995280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc995280" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ahmadjoumblat161"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1114017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1114017.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ahmadjoumblat161" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-A-List-49501.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49501.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code A-List"title="Armani Code A-List"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma995280ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd995280" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1114017">ahmadjoumblat161</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-27">10/27/18 12:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The best warm perfume 2018 , it goes in the same direction of azzaro wanted + the one edp by dolce and gabana , but it has an excellent performance and it last 9 hrs + with 3 hours of projection , a blind buy for this winter</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="995280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=995280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1748743" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1748743" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="410RudyRuuu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1615976"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1615976.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="410RudyRuuu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/CH-Men-Prive-31508.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31508.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CH Men Prive"title="CH Men Prive"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1748743ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1748743" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); we're not friends anymore<br />
<br />
100/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1748743"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1748743#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="49144" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1232134" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mixter99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1038155"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mixter99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Afnan/9am-Dive-78611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="9am Dive"title="9am Dive"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1232134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1232134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1038155">mixter99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-03">10/03/20 08:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From the hype I thought this was going to be an awesome fragrance, after smelling it at the airport I am disappointed. It smells very chemical and like super sweet bubble gum, reminding me of JPG Ultra Male but just not as refined, a bit over complicated. Definitely not for hot weather, I would skip this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1232134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1232134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1395754" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1395754" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kalilax"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8693"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.8693.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kalilax" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Superleggera-95753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"title="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1395754ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1395754" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8693">kalilax</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-20">08/20/21 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I SOOO wanted to love this, but several wears in, I'm consistently getting something in the drydown that's completely off-putting to my nose. Could be "the fruity notes"? I think that is the exact same thing that takes away from a composition that has all the potential to be a truly classy one, but sadly falls short. <br />
Still, I agree that to others around, this will be pleasant, and can draw compliments. My main priority wearing a perfume is my own pleasure though, so I couldn't care less about compliments if I'm not happy with what I'm wearing. <br />
So there, depending on your priorities, this could be meh, or WOW!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1395754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1395754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent968473" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc968473" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GRAF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.727556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GRAF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-Haarlem-3258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="New Haarlem"title="New Haarlem"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma968473ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd968473" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727556">GRAF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-04">08/04/18 04:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the best from Wanted line and one of the best Azzaro scents. Youtful, vivid, playful suitable for evenings mainly, having fun with friends or clubbing.<br />
<br />
I get a sweet, fresh-spicy, bubblegumy ambroxan with very good projection and sillage. Feels very youthfull, it could be a perfect scent for teens imo. Other noticeable notes are cinnamon, mandarin, cypress, iso E super, faint lemon/woody notes and patchouli.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="968473"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=968473#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1222895" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1222895" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="patricescentone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="patricescentone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1222895ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1222895" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235936">patricescentone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-11">09/11/20 03:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very strong cinnamon note that will give you a headache after a while, extremely sweet on top of that!<br />
<br />
If Invictus and CK One Shock had a baby, this would be it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1222895"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1222895#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1161546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1161546" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scottgiles86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1206086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scottgiles86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Eau-Sauvage-Extreme-2010-72771.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72771.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Sauvage Extreme 2010"title="Eau Sauvage Extreme 2010"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1161546ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1161546" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206086">scottgiles86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-07">04/07/20 06:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't let the listed notes fool you. This is sweet fragrance through and through, NOT a woody spicy oriental. Bubblegum fruits with a slight touch of cinnamon. A slightly darker version of dylan blue. I don't pick up any tobacco, leather, or woods. Scent is overall better than the original, but latest formulations don't last very long at all. I prefer 1 Million Prive as the tobacco and cinnamon in there is much more prominent with better longevity. Spicebomb Extreme is better as well, but much more expensive. This is not a scent a mature man would wear...more for young bucks going clubbing. This is a fun fragrance, not one that will get you taken seriously.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49144"comment_id="1161546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html?ccid=1161546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="49144" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>

</div>
        
        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.49144.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html#cc2372418"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Azzaro</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Wanted by Night</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Not even lying when I first smelt this I thought it was like a fragrance for a hotel lobby or something like that. Smells phenomenal in the air.">by

    var lang = 'EN';
    $(document).ready(function () {
                if (lang == 'EN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {

                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });

</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
